About Me

A few things about myself

BIO

My name is Jake Durrer and I am a Film Maker Enthusiast. I make small short films and fun videos. I am an active member of FRC Team 3683 Team Dave. I take the photos, film the videos, and edit all the videos produced within the last year. I am experienced in Adobe Softwares, and have minor knowledge in other programs such as Cinema 4d and Solidworks.
